name: three
description: Multi-agent, multi-LLM vibe-coding orchestrator for complex software tasks.
longDescription:
Orchestrates role-based agents (Oracle, Builder, Researcher, Reviewer, Critic, Sprinter) with session-aware reuse across multiple LLMs (Codex, Gemini, Claude). Features safe capability controls, parallel fan-out, and roundtable consensus for splitting complex tasks, cross-checking results, and converging faster with clear, auditable outputs.

Key Commands:
• /three:conductor - Dispatch complex work across multiple LLMs
• /three:roundtable - Run multi-round discussions for tough decisions
• /three:oracle - Architecture and trade-off analysis
• /three:builder - Implementation and debugging
• /three:reviewer - Code review and quality checks
